name: From the Void (FoozleGames)
description:
A game which only loosely has the objective of getting more points within a defined period.  Points are granted whenever a sun, planet, or moon cross the orbit of another.  The more bodies you have and the later in the time limit, the more each crossing is worth.

This is largely a sandbox meant to have some fun and play with the orbit behavior within Construct 3.  Also really enjoyed making the dynamic icon tray at the bottom of the screen.

Instructions are shown on screen but in general just spam 1, 2, or 3 and use WASD for orbit direction / size control and QE for speed.  Toggle 0 (Number) for objects to be invincible.   Use mouse wheel to zoom in and hour and click and drag to pan.

FULL SCREEN RECOMMENDED! Or mouse wheel zoom will be frustrating :)

Asteroids also randomly spawn and head toward the "black hole".

Hope you enjoy! Not sure if I will attempt to make this into more of a "real" game but maybe someone else will be inspired :).
